attributes.action: Abu Qatada should be immediately expelled from the country even if it does infringe his Human Rights and is against the ECHR
attributes.additional_details:
Abu Qatada is a preacher of hatred and a terrorist to the West and is being protected at extreme costs to the Taxpayers of this country. Home Secretary Theresa May
has not the will to extradite him to Jordan even though Jordan say that he will be given a fair trial. He is making a fool of Britain to the Western world and the message this sends out to the like of him is. You can get away with anything here due to our Judicial system and soft judges and Human Rights Layers.
Urge you to sign this petition.
